text: It is forbidden to step or climb upon, remove, or in any way injure any statue, seat, wall, fountain, or other erection or architectural feature, or any tree, shrub, plant, or turf in said United States Capitol Grounds.

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Removal or injury of property forbidden.
